snippet: KRASNER--Harvey, age 89, of Port Washington, NY passed away on May 11. Beloved husband of Gladys for 68 years, father of Margot, Howard and Cindy, loving grandfather and great-grandfather. Harvey was a pioneer in the data communications industry. He is best remembered for his wit, integrity, love of travel and snorkeling. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KRASNER--Harvey, age 89, of Port Washington, NY passed away on May 11. Beloved husband of Gladys for 68 years, father of Margot, Howard and Cindy, loving grandfather and great-grandfather. Harvey was a pioneer in the data communications industry. He is best remembered for his wit, integrity, love of travel and snorkeling. 1/3
